description: April 3, 2015 Diyala Release. Summary of Changes: Removed the need to log in to the Diyala site. Added 70 new plan images, especially for Khafajah. Added 53 new drawing images for all sites. Added additional images for some graves and hoards. Added publishing information, where known, for drawings and plans. Added additional information about photograph negatives Removed the need to log in to the Diyala site. Added 70 new plan images, especially for Khafajah. Added 53 new drawing images for all sites. Added additional images for some graves and hoards. Added publishing information, where known, for drawings and plans. Added additional information about photograph negatives See AWOL's entry Diyala Archaeological Database (DiyArDa) And see also Oriental Institute Diyala Excavations Publications.
title: Diyala Archaeological Database (DiyArDa) Update
